Published November 2 2014

Taylor Swift pulls her music from Spotify

Taylor Swift pulls her music from Spotify — With music streaming being so popular, and paying less royalties, bigger names will occasionally pull their records to help drive demand and sales for a new album. But Ms. Swift didn’t just pull her latest record, she pulled all of them.

Enjoy your day.
